summary: sweetalert2 v11.4.9 and above contains hidden functionality
details:
I'm the maintainer of sweetalert2.

The current advisory "contains hidden functionality" is invalid because the functionality is now clearly documented in the README of a project:

https://github.com/sweetalert2/sweetalert2#important-notice-about-usage-of-this-software-for-ru-su-by-and-%D1%80%D1%84-domain-zones

Please consider removing this advisory, thank you.
